title: About This Work
subtitle: The Way of Love: Meditations on the Teachings of Jesus

content.text: The Way of Love is a collection of meditations on the teachings of Jesus, designed to invite reflection on the message of the Gospel.
This work was created with the assistance of artificial intelligence, seeking to present eternal truths in an accessible and profound way.
All biblical quotations are from the King James Version.

footer.madeWith: Created with love and AI assistance
